name: EvnTide Online: Hunt for the White Whale (Crabman)
name_original: EvnTide Online: Hunt for the White Whale (Crabman)
description:
A combination of the Nokia 3310, Dying MMO, and Altomare Jam. Fight ships, level up, and catch the white whale before the servers shut down!

Time your shots so you hit your enemies before they can shoot you!

Controls
Arrows - Navigation
Enter/Space/X - Interact
I - Ship Overview Shortcut
M - Toggle Minimap
L - Toggle Sound
Escape - Back/Quit
